about_the_game:
Become the receptionist of the guild and protect your precious daily life!

This is a receptionist simulation game.

The first “Guild Receptionist! good luck!!" while implementing a new system and new members!

You don't need to have played the previous game!

The system slows down the flow of time and allows you to read quests more slowly,” and ”The beginner mode where powerful members join the game from the beginning,

The new beginner mode, in which powerful members join the game from the beginning, etc.

New systems have been added for newcomers and those who couldn't complete the previous game!

Complete quests by placing the appropriate guild members in quests!

Quests have hidden clears, and new guild members can join your guild when you fulfill the conditions!

The fate of the receptionist depends on whether you allow the quest, reject it, or clear it!

About 15 minutes per play! There are 6 different endings in total!

content_descriptors.notes: 1. Very mild violence (fights) and abusive language. This is in the text only and not in the illustrations.

detailed_description:
Become the receptionist of the guild and protect your precious daily life!

This is a receptionist simulation game.

The first “Guild Receptionist! good luck!!" while implementing a new system and new members!

You don't need to have played the previous game!

The system slows down the flow of time and allows you to read quests more slowly,” and ”The beginner mode where powerful members join the game from the beginning,

The new beginner mode, in which powerful members join the game from the beginning, etc.

New systems have been added for newcomers and those who couldn't complete the previous game!

Complete quests by placing the appropriate guild members in quests!

Quests have hidden clears, and new guild members can join your guild when you fulfill the conditions!

The fate of the receptionist depends on whether you allow the quest, reject it, or clear it!

About 15 minutes per play! There are 6 different endings in total!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (Intel processors). Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon-based processors).
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel processors). Apple M1 or above (Apple silicon-based processors).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (Intel processors). Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon-based processors).
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel processors). Apple M1 or above (Apple silicon-based processors).
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)、Windows 10、Windows 11
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)、Windows 10、Windows 11
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Become the receptionist of the guild and protect your precious daily life! This is a simulation game of a receptionist. Whether you run around to protect your village, follow the king, or expose the darkness that pervades the country, the future depends on your choice!
